summary:
May is Osteoporosis Awareness and Prevention Month - Starting in May, and throughout the year, we will be highlighting the stories of 40 inspiring osteoporosis patients via personal videos to raise awareness and commemorate our 40th anniversary. Explore the many ways that you can get involved to help raise awareness as well!

 Interdisciplinary Symposium on Osteoporosis (ISO2024) - Come celebrate the 40th anniversary of BHOF in 2024 by returning to an in-person format for this hallmark event! You don’t want to miss out on the amazing program that we're planning for June 13-15, 2024, at the Capital Hilton in Washington, DC.
